sentences.en: ...the superficiality and transience of the club scene.
sentences.cn: ...这个俱乐部现场的肤浅和稍纵即逝。

sentences.en: "Ode on an Grecian Urn" shows the contrast between the permanence of art and the transience of human passion.
sentences.cn: “希腊古瓮颂”展示了永恒的艺术与短暂的人类热情之间的对比。

sentences.en: During the transience the electron and photon populations deviate slightly from their equilibrium values respectively.
sentences.cn: 在瞬态过程中,电子和光子的密度各稍微偏离其平衡值.

sentences.en: Even babies soon become aware of the transience of human ties.
sentences.cn: 连婴儿也会很快意识到人际关系的短暂无常。

sentences.en: History is a combination between permanence and transience.
sentences.cn: 历史是永久性和瞬时性的结合体,现实是历史的延续,历史是现实的由来.

sentences.en: The different views can't change its specialty that it flows like water and moves in transience.
sentences.cn: 不论大家怎么看待它,都不会影响它动如流水,忽而缥缈无踪的特性.

sentences.en: There is a sense of transience about her, a feeling that she has only stopped off here en route to another place.
sentences.cn: 她给人一种转瞬即逝的感觉，仿佛她只是在前往他处的途中在此略作停留。

sentences.en: There is a sense of transience about her.
sentences.cn: 她给人一种转瞬即逝的感觉。

sentences.en: Transience can be seen in both short - and long - term memory.
sentences.cn: 短暂性在 短期 和 长期 记忆里都存在.

sentences.en: We , therefore, treasure it all the more because of its transience.
sentences.cn: 因为他最易丧失, 所以更觉得他可以宝贵.

trans.tran_en: If you talk about the transience of a situation, you mean that it lasts only a short time or is constantly changing
